article_title: South African Prosecutors to Appeal Pistorius Verdict and Sentence
article_text:
JOHANNESBURG—South African prosecutors will appeal the verdict and sentence in the case of athlete Oscar Pistorius, who shot and killed his girlfriend on Valentine’s Day, 2013, the National Prosecuting Authority said in a statement on Monday, marking a fresh twist in a case that has gripped global attention for over a year.

The appeal will be filed directly at the Supreme Court of Appeals, a spokesman for the prosecution said, instead of the high court, the level at which it was tried. The move will expedite the process...

twitter.description: South African prosecutors will appeal the verdict and sentence in the case of athlete Oscar Pistorius, on claims that the judge misinterpreted the law.
twitter.creator: @MatinaStevis
